TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageStatePersister extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 视图状态持久性机制提供基本功能。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for ASP.NET view state persistence mechanisms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 请求和响应本质上是无状态的。The HTTP requests and responses are inherently stateless. 若要在 HTTP 请求之间维护状态信息，ASP.NET 服务器页可以存储 状态。To maintain state information between HTTP requests, ASP.NET server pages can store state. 此状态称为 "视图状态"，它包含页面和控件设置以及使页面和控件看起来像与用户在服务器上一次往返行程中看到的相同的数据。This state, called view state, consists of page and control settings and data that make the page and controls appear as if they are the same ones that the user saw and interacted with on their last round trip to the server. 有多种机制可用于在对相同页面的连续请求之间存储视图状态。Several mechanisms exist to store view state between successive requests to the same page. Abstract 类表示这些状态信息存储机制的基类。The abstract class represents the base class for these state information storage mechanisms. ASP.NET 中的默认视图状态持久性机制是，将状态信息以 Base64 编码的字符串的形式保留在页面上的隐藏的 HTML 元素（其 `type` 特性设置为 `"hidden"`的元素）。The default view state persistence mechanism in ASP.NET is to maintain the state information as a Base64-encoded string in a hidden HTML element (an element with the `type` attribute set to `"hidden"`) on the page. ASP.NET 页使用 对象执行此工作，使用 实例序列化和反序列化对象状态信息。An ASP.NET page uses a object to perform this work, using an instance to serialize and deserialize object state information. 或者，你可以使用带宽和资源有限的移动客户端的 类，将页面的视图状态存储在服务器上的 对象中。Alternately, you can store the view state for your pages in the object on the server using the class for mobile clients with limited bandwidth and resources. 在某些情况下，可能会完全禁用视图状态持久性。In some cases, you might disable view state persistence altogether. 如果这样做，则结果是有时依赖于状态持久性的页和控件的行为不正确。If you do this, the result is that sometimes pages and controls that rely on state persistence do not behave correctly. 有关页状态管理和视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information about page state management and view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 如果你正在编写控件，则可以将控件的状态信息存储在 字典中，这是一个 对象。If you are writing controls, you can store state information for the controls in the dictionary, which is a object. 开发人员可通过 属性检索控件状态。A developer would retrieve the control state through the property. 将键和值分配给 属性， 对象将序列化请求之间的状态信息。You assign keys and values to the property, and the object serializes the state information between requests. 若要在控件中执行自定义状态处理，请重写 和 方法。To perform custom state handling in your control, override the and methods. 当页开发人员禁用视图状态时，存储在此字典中的任何状态信息都将丢失。Any state information that is stored in this dictionary is lost when view state is disabled by a page developer. 为了缓解这种情况，在 ASP.NET 版本2.0 中，你可以将重要状态信息存储在一个名为控制状态的单独对象中。To mitigate this, in ASP.NET version 2.0 you can store critical state information in a separate object, called control state. 当页开发人员禁用视图状态时，控件状态对象将不受影响。The control state object is not affected when view state is disabled by a page developer. 将状态信息存储在控件状态对象中要求控件重写 和 方法，以及在每次初始化控件时，将控件注册为在控件状态中存储状态信息。Storing state information in the control state object requires that the control override the and methods and that the control be registered to store state information in control state every time the control is initialized. 可以通过重写 方法并调用 方法，将控件注册为使用控件状态。You can register a control to use control state by overriding the method and calling the method. 有关在开发控件时使用 属性和控件状态的详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information about using the property and control state when developing controls, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). 若要在不支持现有视图状态持久性机制的客户端上维护视图状态，你可以扩展 类以引入你自己的视图状态持久性方法，并可以使用页面适配器将 ASP.NET 应用程序配置为根据要为其提供页面的客户端的类型，使用不同的视图状态持久性机制。To maintain view state on clients that cannot support the existing view state persistence mechanisms, you can extend the class to introduce your own view state persistence methods, and you can use page adapters to configure your ASP.NET application to use different view state persistence mechanisms based on the type of client to which a page is served. 派生自 类的类必须重写抽象 方法，以便在持久性介质中存储视图状态和控件状态，并重写 方法来提取它。Classes that derive from the class must override the abstract method to store view state and control state in the persistence medium, and override the method to extract it. 如果需要将视图状态和控件状态序列化为字符串，则可以使用通过 属性访问的 对象。If you need to serialize view state and control state to a string, you can use the object that is accessed using the property. 它可以有效地将对象状态信息序列化和反序列化为 Base64 编码的字符串。It efficiently serializes and deserializes object state information to a Base64-encoded string. 您还可以重写 属性以提供您自己的对象状态序列化机制。You can also override the property to supply your own object state serialization mechanism. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个在 Web 服务器上保存视图和控件状态的 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a object that saves view and control state on the Web server. `StreamPageStatePersister` 演示如何重写 和 方法以提取和保存视图状态信息。The `StreamPageStatePersister` demonstrates how to override the and methods to extract and save view state information. 由于状态持久性机制与自适应呈现和客户端功能相关，因此提供了 `MyPageAdapter` 类来激活 ASP.NET 应用程序的 `StreamPageStatePersister`。Because the state persistence mechanisms are related to adaptive rendering and client capabilities, the `MyPageAdapter` class is provided to activate the `StreamPageStatePersister` for an ASP.NET application. 最后，提供浏览器功能（.browser）文件，以便为特定的一类客户端（在本例中为默认 Web 浏览器）启用 `MyPageAdapter` 适配器。Finally, a browser capabilities (.browser) file is provided to enable the `MyPageAdapter` adapter for a specific class of clients (in this case, the default Web browser). [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个 类，该类返回一个 `StreamPageStatePersister`实例，该实例用于保存 ASP.NET 网页的视图和控件状态。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class that returns an instance of `StreamPageStatePersister`, which is used to persist view and control state for an ASP.NET Web page. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/mypageadapter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/mypageadapter.vb#5)] 使用以下编译器命令行，将这两个类编译为可用于运行示例的程序集。Compile these two classes into an assembly that you can use to run a sample, using the following compiler command line. 确保已编译的程序集位于 ASP.NET 应用程序根目录下的 \Bin 目录中。Ensure that the compiled assembly is in the \Bin directory underneath the ASP.NET application root. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/mypageadapter.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/mypageadapter.vb#6)] 最后，若要启用 `MyPageAdapter` 适配器，必须在 ASP.NET 应用程序根目录下创建一个名为浏览器的目录，并包括包含配置信息的 .browser 文件。Finally, to enable the `MyPageAdapter` adapter, you must create a directory named Browsers underneath the ASP.NET application root, and include a .browser file with configuration information. 配置文件中的 `` 元素指示配置将覆盖默认浏览器配置文件中为默认浏览器指定的值。The `` element in the configuration file indicates that the configuration overrides the values specified for the default browser in the Default.browser configuration file. 在此示例中，`MyPageAdapter` 用于 ASP.NET 网页（通常不使用适配器）。In this example, `MyPageAdapter` is used for ASP.NET Web pages (where normally no adapter is used). ``` ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象表示当前 对象包含的控件用于跨 Web 服务器的 HTTP 请求保留的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the data that controls contained by the current object use to persist across HTTP requests to the Web server.

value.span: 包含视图状态数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains view state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件状态是由 Web 服务器控件需要运行的关键视图状态数据组成的对象，它包含在与普通视图状态信息不同的对象中。Control state is an object comprised of critical view state data that Web server controls need to function, and is contained in a separate object from normal view state information. 在 级别禁用视图状态时，控件状态数据不会受到影响，但需要额外的实现步骤才能使用。Control state data is not affected when view state is disabled at the level, but requires extra implementation steps to use. 有关在开发控件时使用 属性和控件状态的详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information on using the property and control state when developing controls, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将派生自 类的类初始化 属性。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class initializes the property. 在此示例中， 属性已分配给 对象的 字段，并使用 类进行序列化。In this example, the property has been assigned to the field of a object, and serialized using the class. 调用 方法时， 类用于对视图状态和控件状态信息进行反序列化， 属性从生成的 对象的 字段进行初始化。When the method is called, the class is used to deserialize view state and control state information, and the property is initialized from the resulting object's field. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Load() cil managed

summary.span: 在 对象初始化其控件层次结构时，由派生类重写以反序列化并加载保留的状态信息。

span.span: Overridden by derived classes to deserialize and load persisted state information when a object initializes its control hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 类的类实现 方法，以便从某种持久格式初始化 和 属性。Classes that derive from the class implement the method to initialize the and properties from some persisted format. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示派生自 类的类如何实现 方法以从持久性介质加载视图状态。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class implements the method to load view state from a persistence medium. `StreamPageStatePersister` 尝试从流中读取数据。The `StreamPageStatePersister` attempts to read data from a stream. 它使用 对象对视图状态数据进行反序列化，并初始化 属性和 属性，页面使用该属性来初始化控件。It uses an object to deserialize view state data and initialize the property and the property, which a page uses to initialize controls. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 类的类实现 方法，以将 和 属性的内容保存到持久性介质中。Classes that derive from the class implement the method to persist the contents of the and properties to a persistence medium. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示派生自 类的类如何实现 方法以将视图状态持久保存到持久性介质中。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class implements the method to persist view state to a persistence medium. `StreamPageStatePersister` 使用 对象序列化 属性和 属性的内容。The `StreamPageStatePersister` uses an object to serialize the contents of the property and property. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写 属性以提供您自己的视图状态格式化程序。You can override the property to provide your own view state formatter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示派生自 类的类如何访问 属性以检索 对象，这是 接口的默认实现，用于将视图状态和控件状态序列化为流。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class accesses the property to retrieve an object, which is the default implementation of the interface, to serialize view state and control state to a stream. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象表示当前 对象包含的控件用于跨 Web 服务器的 HTTP 请求保留的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the data that controls contained by the current object use to persist across HTTP requests to the Web server.

value.span: 包含视图状态数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains view state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是 Web 服务器控件需要运行并呈现自身的状态数据字典。View state is a dictionary of state data that Web server controls need to function and render themselves. 控件开发人员通常使用 属性访问视图状态对象。Control developers typically access the view state object using the property. 当在 级别禁用视图状态时，视图状态将受到影响，因此在这些情况下，控件可能不会正常运行。View state is affected when view state is disabled at the level, and as a result controls might not behave correctly in these scenarios. 有关在开发控件时使用 和控件状态的详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information on using and control state when developing controls, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将派生自 类的类初始化 属性。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class initializes the property. 在此示例中， 属性已分配给 对象的 字段，并使用 对象进行序列化，该对象是 接口的实例。In this example, the property has been assigned to the field of a object, and serialized using the object, which is an instance of the interface. 调用 方法时，将使用 接口对视图状态信息进行反序列化， 属性从生成的 对象的 字段进行初始化。When the method is called, the interface is used to deserialize view state information, and the property is initialized from the resulting object's field. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]
